CLUE: Wife of Leofric, an early streaker!
FOUND IN: Lady Godiva - A legend tells that she rode naked through the streets as a form of protest against high taxes imposed by her husband, Leofric, Earl of Mercia
Bill (as in currency bill or an itemized statement from a financial institution, sharing the same "b" with 'beak')
Jack (as in "jack-of-all-trades," also a playing card, slang for a resourceful person often associated with the sea or travels)

CLUE: Push lips out as sign of annoyance

FOUND IN: Eft (specifically a young American eft - the juvenile phase of some newt species)

CLUE: Apt or witty remark - in France
FOUND IN: À bientôt avec un bon mot! (See you soon with a good one!)
